extension_description.message: Save the web page to SiYuan with one click

save_path_placeholder.message: Input the keyword then Enter to search

tags_placeholder.message: Use commas to separate multiple tags

exp_tips.message: *: Experimental features may be unstable. If there is a problem with clipping, consider switching it.

exp_list_doc_tree.message: After clipping a web page, display the document tree*

tip_first_time.message: After installing the SiYuan extension for the first time, please refresh the page before using it

tip_token_miss.message: Please config API token before clipping content

tip_save_path_miss.message: Please select save path before clipping content

tip_siyuan_kernel_unavailable.message: Please start SiYuan and ensure network connectivity before trying again
